name: Hold To The Rod
description:
Help the people reach the tree! They will face various obstacles on their way. 

MISTS OF DARKNESS: Sometimes people are covered by dark mist and lose there way, wipe the mouse over the mist to clear it away.

WANDERING OFF: Sometimes people get distracted and walk away from the path. Click on the wandering person, and guide them back up to the path.

MOCKED: Sometimes people get mocked by those from the floating building. Tap on the mocking person to help the one being mocked get back on track.

CREDITS:  Design, programming, sound, and music: Jeremy "The Propagation" English

Art: Stephen Beckstrand

Any support and feedback is appreciated!

Upcoming update goals:
